name: Duophage
description:
This is Duophage. You play as a Bacteriophage released onto the body of a sick patient diagnosed with a terminal disease- and it's your job to save him. Clear his infected organs one by one, his Liver, Lungs, Heart and Brain. In order to cleanse him from the sickness you should be getting rid of all the hostile organisms, until the only one left is... you? 

~Submission for the ACI Game Jam 2022~ 

Team Orb - Ege Özdemir and Arhan Barut 

Special thanks to Aleyna Özbal for the music 

(The game ended up switching platforms from LibGDX to Unity due to a change in plans late in the process, so it is currently unfinished. Stay tuned for future updates where we might polish the game up a bit more [By bit more I mean completely redoing the game])

PLAYING INSTRUCTIONS (For the early beta)

Try to avoid the incoming cells (They will always try to follow you), incase of a collision the level will restart. 

At the end of each level there will be a gate made up of two tentacles, enter it to proceed.

CONTROLS

WASD - Thrust

Escape - Quit the game (only works in the last scene)
